Damn, those are two ugly ass humans!!!!!

You can compensate for the audio synch through one of the audio options in VLC (you can enter a manual audio delay, +/-, in ms).  On movie-length videos, you have to change it a few times as the difference gets bigger, but it makes it watchable.
